data.title: Qt Group
data.meta_description:
Qt Group | 39,907 followers on LinkedIn. Qt Group (Nasdaq Helsinki:â€¯QTCOM) is a global software company, trusted by industry leaders and over 1.5 million developers worldwide to create applications and smart devices that users love.â€¯We help our customers to increase productivity through the entire product development lifecycle - from UI design and software development to quality management and deployment.

Our customers are in more than 70 different industries in over 180 countries.
data.text:
Join Magnus Theile, Managing Director and CTO at CONZE Informatik GmbH, as he discusses their collaboration with Qt in the medical field. Learn how Qt enabled them to develop efficient, custom controls, rapid prototypes, and fast, stable solutions for critical applications like dental reconstruction and emergency devices. Discover how to build safe and effective medical devices and healthcare software with Qt: https://lnkd.in/gZihipRk #QtDev #MedTech #MedicalDevices #Healthcare #HealthcareSoftware

With the recent release of Qt 6.8 Beta 3, we're excited to introduce new features: the enhanced effect nodes in Qt Quick Effect Maker. Discover the Glow node for customizable glow effects, the MaskedBlur node with adjustable blur parameters, and the SpriteAnimation node for smoother sprite animations. Explore the animated Bars effect and the performance-optimized CircleBend node for circular UI elements. Learn more about these new effects and get started here: https://hubs.li/Q02MH80_0 #QQEM #UI #Nodes #Animation #VisualEffects

Qt Contributor Summit 2024 is almost here! Join us next week, September 5th & 6th live from WÃ¼rzburg, Germany ðŸ‡©ðŸ‡ª This free event offers in-depth technical discussions and collaboration within the Qt community. It coincides with KDE Akademy, held from September 7th to 12th. Whether you're an experienced contributor or a Qt enthusiast, there's something for everyone. Learn more on our wiki page: https://hubs.li/Q02MvBxB0 #OpenSource #OpenSourceCommunity #OpenSourceDevelopment #SoftwareDeveloper #SoftwareDevelopment

ðŸ“£ We're seeking a Trainee, Learning Content Creator to join our Espoo, Finland ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡® team! We are looking for a motivated and efficient individual to join our Product Management Learning team for a three-month Traineeship. The role will involve supporting the creation and localization of Qt Academy courses. Qt Academy is Qt Group's free eLearning platform for learning Qt framework and tools. Join us for an exhilarating journey in a growing global market, where you'll be part of a vibrant, rapidly expanding, and truly international team that values openness, continuous learning, mutual support, and fun. Learn more and apply: https://hubs.li/Q02MkZP60 #NowHiring #JoinOurTeam #LearningContent #Trainee #Finland

Meet PrzemysÅ‚aw Nogaj, a Head of HMI Technology at Spyrosoft with nearly 15 years of experience using Qt! From his early days in IT to leading HMI projects, PrzemysÅ‚awâ€™s journey highlights his passion for creating top-notch user experiences. His advice? Stay open-minded, focus on user needs, and never stop learning. Dive into PrzemysÅ‚awâ€™s full Qt Journey story: https://lnkd.in/da8C2Mzd #QtDev #UserExperience #HMI #Developer #TechInspiration

Qt Group is coming to Bengaluru, India ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡³ on September 5th for a free-of-charge Meet Qt seminar! Join us for this live event, where you'll have the opportunity to meet Qt experts, connect with other Qt customers and community members, and explore the latest tools for creating software applications and embedded devices, from prototype design to production. Attendance is free, but space is limited! Reserve your spot today: https://hubs.li/Q02M8Zyv0 #QtDev #Bangalore #India #SoftwareDeveloper #SoftwareTesting

Last week, we had the privilege of hosting the LG Future Leaders at our Espoo, Finland ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡® office! Each year, LG Electronics carefully selects outstanding individuals to support their educational journey, and this year, we welcomed the Aalto EMBA LG HRP group from the Aalto EMBA in Seoul for LG, Helsinki Residency Program (HRP). This program offers these leaders a unique opportunity to visit Aalto University Executive Education and Professional Development and we were delighted to participate in it. The theme for this year was "Nordic Leadership for Innovation," which made the experience all the more inspiring ðŸ¤© #LGFutureLeaders #Aalto #Leadership #Innovation #Inspiration

Join Volker Hilsheimer, Qt expert and Chief Maintainer of the Qt project, and Fabian Kosmale, Qt QML team manager, as they delve into Qt internals revealed through stack traces. Learn to better understand whatâ€™s happening before execution hits your code and enhance your debugging skills with expert insights. Check out their full talk on decoding stack traces here: https://hubs.li/Q02LSPSs0 #QtDev #QML #SoftwareDeveloper #Code #SoftwareDevelopment

Missed last week's Visionary Voices of Tech panel? Revolutionizing Healthcare: The Future of Intuitive Medical Devices is now available on demand! ðŸŽ¥ Join experts from Clarius, Witekio, and Ezurio as they explore AI in healthcare, cutting-edge medical devices, and regulatory hurdles. Watch here: https://hubs.li/Q02LH7b00 #Medical #Healthcare #MedTech #HealthcareInnovation #AI

Your primary focus will be on product-specific onboarding, training, and competence development for our global teams of Solution Engineers. Join us for an exhilarating journey in a growing global market, where you'll be part of a vibrant, rapidly expanding, and truly international team that values openness, continuous learning, mutual support, and fun.
